name: English Gardener
description: An absolute favorite of our customers. Tea, the composition of which is called "brilliant".

name: Three in a Boat
description: An unusual combination of black tea, exotic mango and favorite berries creates an atmosphere of adventure.

name: Cherry Marzipan
description: Bright and harmonious tea, combining amazing notes.

name: Cherry Citrus
description: According to the results of a blind quality test, this is the best cherry tea on the market!

name: Honey Loop
description: The tea is richly sweet, with notes of honey, vanilla, caramel. Shades of citrus are born in the leaves of lemongrass.

name: Catherine Deneuve
description: One of the most berry blends: with strawberries, red and black currants. Very bright and sparkling.

name: Milk Oolong
description: One of the most popular oolongs in the world with a mild milky aroma that does not overwhelm the taste of tea.

name: Saint Petersburg Sky
description: Tea that will give strength, cheer you up and help you survive the gloomy autumn days.

name: Earl Gray Classic
description: Famous black tea, beloved by the British, with a citrus note of bergamot. Nothing extra.

name: Lady Caramel
description: Strong black tea balances the viscous sweetness of caramel and brisk cherry sourness.
